name: UNICEF Personalized Learning AI Toolkit
description: An online website that organizes, curates, and provides education of 7 different AI learning personalization modelsâ€™ documentation with an overall aim to increase learning outcomes for all children by leveraging the power of AI and making it accessible to both technical and non-technical users to implement and customize to existing LMS solutions.

SDGs.evidenceText: This compendium of open source AI models and datasets helps country offices of education scale personalized learning solutions to increase learning outcomes in all children.
